mDDMa2Zdp6-5Gl55E.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
mDDMa2Zdp6-5Gl55E.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

mfWOS-hckoAQfamxf.name: Oxygen Storage
mfWOS-hckoAQfamxf.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m2e0u2buYHF3_pPOb.name: Oxygen Storage
m2e0u2buYHF3_pPOb.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mL29212mA3KnbAHMF.name: Oxygen Storage
mL29212mA3KnbAHMF.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mZX00OIC6oR419EZR.name: Oxygen Storage
mZX00OIC6oR419EZR.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

teoNR2cTwSFfk8sG7.name: High Pain Threshold
teoNR2cTwSFfk8sG7.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

mM6cW2OBugi4CG7lS.name: Diffuse
mM6cW2OBugi4CG7lS.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mm1ytBKFWQ6UUojvz.name: Homogenous
mm1ytBKFWQ6UUojvz.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mo-N6bYBH6I7_e4Bl.name: No Blood
mo-N6bYBH6I7_e4Bl.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mOSYqfV3amQS-zNU-.name: No Brain
mOSYqfV3amQS-zNU-.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mzRWch5M8Xpr6lbVd.name: No Eyes
mzRWch5M8Xpr6lbVd.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

ms_8zx-hRxQE8yu14.name: No Head
ms_8zx-hRxQE8yu14.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mDXEd8wG_m4BKVTUj.name: No Neck
mDXEd8wG_m4BKVTUj.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mmc2ZPjLnURskDj1q.name: No Vitals
mmc2ZPjLnURskDj1q.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mWO5c1gFHTeMyG0sL.name: Unliving
mWO5c1gFHTeMyG0sL.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
